snippet.title: The Spirit of the Samurai - Official Announcement Trailer | Future Games Show 2023
snippet.description: A village in peril. A samurai reanimated. An Oni advancing. Check out the thrilling announcement trailer for The Spirit of the Samurai to see fearsome enemies, combat, and more from this upcoming 2D stop-motion action-adventure game, where you fight an army of undead warriors and Japanese monsters as a human, a Kodama, and a cat.
